name: mutely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
silently or without speaking: All the colour drained from his face and he shook his head mutely. She could only nod mutely, as her hand gripped his.
More examplesFewer examplesShe stared mutely into his eyes as he spoke.The survivors stood nearby, mutely watching the rescue efforts.Her son sat there mutely, his arms crossed.The reporter was sitting mutely on a chair, gazing about him as if dazed.She refused to speak and just stared mutely into her lap.
